definition: abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards

sentences.english: Ask to be with Tony Leung's joint property?
sentences.chinese: 问到可有跟梁朝伟的联名物业？

sentences.english: The film also stars Cannes best actor winner Tony Leung Chiu-wai and Chinese newcomer Tang Wei.
sentences.chinese: 主演还有嘎纳电影节影帝梁朝伟和中国青年演员汤唯。

sentences.english: XIAO-Yan is the first emperor of the Liang Dynasty in Wei and Jin era.
sentences.chinese: 梁武帝萧衍是魏晋南北朝时期梁朝的开国帝王。

sentences.english: Tony Leung Chiu Wai (the one who's been in a bunch of Wong Kar Wai movies, not Tony Leung Ka Fai) is a big fan of American crime writer Lawrence Block.
sentences.chinese: 梁朝伟是美国犯罪作家劳伦斯卜洛克的大粉丝。

sentences.english: XIAO-Yan is the first emperor of the hang Dynasty in Wei and Jin era.
sentences.chinese: 梁武帝萧衍是魏晋南北朝时期梁朝的开国帝王。

sentences.english: Liang, the annual national merchant fleet arrived in Guangzhou, more than 10 groups.
sentences.chinese: 梁朝时，每年来到广州的各国商船有10多批。

sentences.english: The project is Yee's first work in 24 years with Leung.
sentences.chinese: 此部电影也是24年后尔冬升与梁朝伟的再次携手。

definition: Song of the Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479), with capital at Nanjing
rebellion against Liang of the Southern Dynasties 南朝梁 in 548
Song of the Southern dynasties (420-479), with capital at Nanjing/also known as Liu Song 劉宋|刘宋
Eastern Wei of the Northern dynasties (534-550), formed from the break-up of Wei of the Northern Dynasties 北魏
the Northern Zhou Dynasty (557-581)/one of the Northern Dynasties
Tang of the Five Southern Dynasties 937-975
Wei of the Northern Dynasties (386-534), founded by the Tuoba 拓跋 branch of Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑
